en.title: About Me
en.description1: I am a passionate software engineer that is always looking to expand my knowledge and seek new solutions for interesting problems. I love to mentor new software engineers and I am not afraid to step up and lead successful engineering teams to deliver quality products and address technical debt.
en.description2: When I am not coming up with solutions to new and exciting problems, creating tickets or coding you can find me cruising through the forests and mountains on my bike.
